amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that, to the greatest extent practicable, equipment and products purchased with funds made available under the bill should be American-made.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that, to the extent possible, the funds authorized in the bill should be used to purchase goods and equipment made in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
